                                 Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
After serving as a bridesmaid 27 times, a young woman wrestles with the idea of 
standing by her sister&#039;s side as her sibling marries the man she&#039;s secretly in 
love with.

Director: Anne Fletcher

Writer  : Aline Brosh McKenna

Cast:
